snippet.title: Angry Birds Trilogy Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Gather your flock and sling into action, Angry Birds is taking flight on Nintendo Wii™ and Wii U™ systems everywhere!

The Angry Birds Trilogy features 3 best-selling Angry Birds games in 1: Angry Birds, Angry Birds Seasons & Angry Birds Rio. It includes as much as 140 hours of comical, addictive gameplay, and 30 episodes on disc -- including exclusive NEW levels. In addition it has Wii U Gamepad and TV swap capability, touch screen controls and online leaderboards.

LIKE the birds at http://facebook.com/angrybirds
FOLLOW the birds at http://twitter.com/angrybirds
SUBMIT fan art to http://angrybirds.tumblr.com
SLINGSHOT birds at http://angrybirds.com
